title: I need 3 rp  to get poro rider sejuani for myself Plz Riot
body: so i just gone back from buying an rp card and then when i was about to buy both santa gragas and poro rider sejuani i was missing 3 rp and couldn`t afford the poro rider sejuani skin. i dont have any money left to go buy another rp card. so riot pls help me and give me 3 rp

replies.body: Have you tried submitting a ticket yet? https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
So people can get a few RP from submitting tickets?? Cause he's not lost any RP either, just needs a few more. I feel like some of the posts aren't read all the way, and only glanced at....

Nope, it's correct :-)

If you need a few RP to round up to a shiny prize, Riot are happy to assist. I think generally it's up to about 10RP, and obviously only once in a blue moon (can't keep coming back for more!). Rioters apparently also love receiving fan art in exchange for this service - or so the rumours go...
